title: Pseudo Love
description:
Description :
        Baek Ga-in is a university student doing multiple jobs, living a double life as a demon worship concept streamer 'Lucia.' She has been carrying past scars of being entangled within a cult but suddenly her stream attracts a real demon, an 'incubus'?! A demon, human and... an angel?! This is not a 'cult' it is that campus fantasy romance!!
